entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches early this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
